      • isChance

        public boolean isChance(int percentageOfHappening,
                        int maximumPercentage)
        Chance system
        Parameters:
        percentageOfHappening - Chance if this happening.
        maximumPercentage - Maximum percentage. (Recommend 100)
        Returns:
        If the chance value was less than or equal to the "percentageOfHappening".

        Chance system
        Parameters:

        maximumPercentage - Maximum percentage. (Recommend 100)
        Returns:

      • roundValue

        public double roundValue(double value,
                         int places)
        Tries to round the given value based on the given places.
        Parameters:
        value - The value you wish to round.
        places - How many places to the right should it round to.
        Returns:
        The rounded value (If it could be rounded).
